dict.acceptation: 女性的；雌性的；能结果实的；电气设备阴的；
女人；雌性动物；雌性植物，雌株；

sent.orig: Female genital mutilation usually involves the removal of the clitoris and other parts of female genitalia.
sent.trans: 女性割礼通常是将阴蒂或生殖器其他部份割除。

sent.orig: The female pupils had highest achievement motivation under the instruction of female teacher.
sent.trans: 女性导师教导下的女童成就动机最高。

sent.orig: Methods The 32 female transsexualism and the 32 normal female are tested with MMPI.
sent.trans: 方法对32例女性易性症患者和32例正常女性进行了明尼苏达多项人格(MMPI)测验。

sent.orig: The third section, the author according to feminism theory explains female writing and female autography.
sent.trans: 第三部分是从女性主义理论的角度诠释女性书写和女性自传。

sent.orig: In total points for life adjustment, female children were superior to non-female children and single children.
sent.trans: 在[生活适应总得分]上，独生女童优于非独生女童，亦优于独生男童。
